purpose: The email announces the 7th International Workshop on Formal Methods for Autonomous Systems (FMAS 2025), scheduled to take place in Paris, France from November 17 to 19, 2025. It invites researchers to submit papers on formal verification techniques for autonomous systems, highlighting key challenges and encouraging collaboration. The email provides important dates for submissions and notifications, outlines the scope and topics of interest, and details the submission categories and requirements. Additionally, it mentions a special topic on Human-AI Teams and the opportunity for a best paper award and a special issue in a journal.

evidence_sentences: FMAS 2025 is a 2.5-day peer-reviewed international workshop that brings together researchers working on a range of techniques for the formal verification of autonomous systems.
FMAS welcomes submissions that use formal methods to specify, model, or verify autonomous systems; in whole or in part.
In addition to the topics above, we would like to invite work on formal methods for human-AI teamwork.
There are four categories of submission: Vision papers, Research previews, Experience report papers, Regular papers.
FMAS 2025 will honour the best paper selected with respect to reviews, programme committee discussions, and conference presentations with an award.
